name: Mom's raisin bars
steps: Cream brown sugar, butter and 1/2 tsp vanilla. Add oats, flour, pecans, soda and salt. Take 2 c. out and press into 13x9 pan. Combine in raisins, cond. milk, lemon juice, lemon peel . Bring this to a boil and cool. Pour raisin mixture on top of oat crust leaving an edge. Put rest of oat mixture on top. Press down top mixture. Bake at 375 F for 25-30 min.
